import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class CustomerSaveForLater extends Component { state = {}; renderTenderTable = () => { let srNo = 0; let tenderList = this.props.tenderList.filter( (tender) => tender.isPublished === false ); return tenderList.map((tender) => { srNo++; return ( {`#000${srNo}`} this.props.tenderClicked(tender._id)} > {tender._id.toString().substring(19, 24)} {tender.budgetAmount} {tender.creationDate} {tender.deliveryDate} {tender.closingDate} {tender.status} ); }); }; render() { return (
